text: @dcexaminer @brianstelter @GenFlynn Oh, and this question to the WH press sec. is a bigger deal than the deaths, etc.? “You made a comment … in which you said President Trump will not allow the coronavirus to come to this country. Given what has happened since then, obviously, would you like to take that back?”
